name: London
description: The capital city of England, known for its rich history and vibrant culture.

activities.title: London Eye
activities.description: Enjoy a breathtaking view of London from the iconic Ferris wheel.

activities.title: Tower of London
activities.description: Explore the historic castle and see the Crown Jewels.

activities.title: Buckingham Palace
activities.description: Witness the Changing of the Guard at the royal residence.

activities.title: British Museum
activities.description: Discover artifacts from around the world at this famous museum.

activities.title: Hyde Park
activities.description: Relax in one of London's largest and most beautiful parks.

activities.title: West End Theatre
activities.description: Enjoy a world-class theatre performance in London's West End.

activities.title: Thames River Cruise
activities.description: Take a scenic boat cruise along the River Thames.

activities.title: Camden Market
activities.description: Shop for unique items at the bustling Camden Market.

activities.title: Natural History Museum
activities.description: Explore exhibits about the natural world.

activities.title: Kew Gardens
activities.description: Visit the Royal Botanic Gardens at Kew.

name: Berlin
description: The capital city of Germany, known for its history and modern attractions.

activities.title: Brandenburg Gate
activities.description: Visit the iconic symbol of Berlin.

activities.title: Berlin Wall Memorial
activities.description: Learn about the history of the Berlin Wall.

activities.title: Museum Island
activities.description: Explore museums with art and historical artifacts.

activities.title: Reichstag Building
activities.description: Visit the German parliament building with its glass dome.

activities.title: Berlin Zoo
activities.description: See a wide variety of animals at the Berlin Zoo.

activities.title: East Side Gallery
activities.description: View the murals on the longest remaining section of the Berlin Wall.

activities.title: Checkpoint Charlie
activities.description: Visit the famous Cold War border crossing point.

activities.title: Pergamon Museum
activities.description: See the impressive collection of ancient artifacts.

activities.title: Charlottenburg Palace
activities.description: Tour the stunning baroque palace.

activities.title: Tiergarten
activities.description: Relax in Berlin's most popular inner-city park.

name: Paris
description: The capital city of France, known for its art, fashion, and culture.

activities.title: Eiffel Tower
activities.description: Climb the iconic landmark for a view of Paris.

activities.title: Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore the world-famous art museum.

activities.title: Notre-Dame Cathedral
activities.description: Visit the historic cathedral.

activities.title: Montmartre
activities.description: Wander through the artistic district of Paris.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Take a boat cruise along the Seine River.

activities.title: Champs-Élysées
activities.description: Shop and dine along the famous avenue.

activities.title: Versailles Palace
activities.description: Tour the opulent palace and gardens.

activities.title: Sainte-Chapelle
activities.description: See the stunning stained glass windows.

activities.title: Luxembourg Gardens
activities.description: Relax in the beautiful gardens.

activities.title: Opera Garnier
activities.description: Visit the grand opera house.

name: Madrid
description: The capital city of Spain, known for its vibrant nightlife and cultural sites.

activities.title: Prado Museum
activities.description: Explore Spain's premier art museum.

activities.title: Royal Palace
activities.description: Visit the official residence of the Spanish Royal Family.

activities.title: Retiro Park
activities.description: Relax in Madrid's most famous park.

activities.title: Santiago Bernabéu Stadium
activities.description: Tour the home of Real Madrid football club.

activities.title: Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum
activities.description: See the art collection of the Thyssen-Bornemisza family.

activities.title: Puerta del Sol
activities.description: Visit the bustling public square.

activities.title: Plaza Mayor
activities.description: Explore the historic main square of Madrid.

activities.title: Gran Via
activities.description: Walk along Madrid's most famous street.

activities.title: Temple of Debod
activities.description: Visit the ancient Egyptian temple.

activities.title: El Rastro
activities.description: Shop at the famous open-air flea market.

name: Rome
description: The capital city of Italy, known for its nearly 3,000 years of globally influential art, architecture, and culture.

activities.title: Colosseum
activities.description: Visit the iconic ancient amphitheater.

activities.title: Vatican Museums
activities.description: Explore the vast art collections of the Vatican.

activities.title: Pantheon
activities.description: See the former Roman temple, now a church.

activities.title: Trevi Fountain
activities.description: Throw a coin into the famous fountain.

activities.title: Roman Forum
activities.description: Walk through the ruins of ancient Rome's center.

activities.title: Piazza Navona
activities.description: Relax at one of Rome's most famous squares.

activities.title: St. Peter's Basilica
activities.description: Visit the world's largest church.

activities.title: Sistine Chapel
activities.description: See Michelangelo's famous ceiling frescoes.

activities.title: Castel Sant'Angelo
activities.description: Tour the historic castle and its museum.

activities.title: Villa Borghese
activities.description: Stroll through the beautiful gardens and visit the art gallery.

name: Amsterdam
description: The capital city of the Netherlands, known for its artistic heritage, elaborate canal system, and narrow houses with gabled facades.

activities.title: Anne Frank House
activities.description: Visit the house where Anne Frank wrote her diary.

activities.title: Van Gogh Museum
activities.description: Explore the largest collection of Van Gogh's works.

activities.title: Rijksmuseum
activities.description: Discover Dutch art and history from the Middle Ages to the present day.

activities.title: Vondelpark
activities.description: Relax in the largest city park in Amsterdam.

activities.title: Canal Cruise
activities.description: Take a boat tour through Amsterdam's famous canals.

activities.title: Dam Square
activities.description: Visit the central square of Amsterdam.

activities.title: Heineken Experience
activities.description: Tour the former brewery of the famous Dutch beer.

activities.title: Red Light District
activities.description: Explore Amsterdam's most famous neighborhood.

activities.title: NEMO Science Museum
activities.description: Enjoy interactive exhibits at the science museum.

activities.title: Jordaan
activities.description: Wander through the charming streets of the Jordaan neighborhood.

name: Oslo
description: The capital city of Norway, known for its green spaces and museums.

activities.title: Vigeland Park
activities.description: Explore the world's largest sculpture park made by a single artist.

activities.title: Akershus Fortress
activities.description: Visit the medieval castle and fortress.

activities.title: Munch Museum
activities.description: See the works of the famous Norwegian artist Edvard Munch.

activities.title: Viking Ship Museum
activities.description: Discover well-preserved Viking ships and artifacts.

activities.title: Holmenkollen Ski Museum
activities.description: Learn about the history of skiing and visit the observation deck.

activities.title: Oslo Opera House
activities.description: Attend a performance or walk on the roof of this architectural masterpiece.

activities.title: Fram Museum
activities.description: Explore the polar exploration vessel Fram.

activities.title: Kon-Tiki Museum
activities.description: Learn about Thor Heyerdahl's famous expeditions.

activities.title: Norwegian Folk Museum
activities.description: Visit the open-air museum with traditional buildings.

activities.title: Bygdøy Peninsula
activities.description: Explore the beautiful peninsula with several museums and beaches.

name: Stockholm
description: The capital city of Sweden, known for its beautiful archipelago and rich history.

activities.title: Vasa Museum
activities.description: See the well-preserved 17th-century ship.

activities.title: Gamla Stan
activities.description: Wander through the charming old town.

activities.title: Skansen
activities.description: Visit the open-air museum and zoo.

activities.title: Stockholm Palace
activities.description: Tour the official residence of the Swedish monarch.

activities.title: ABBA Museum
activities.description: Learn about the famous Swedish pop group.

activities.title: Fotografiska
activities.description: Explore the contemporary photography museum.

activities.title: Djurgården
activities.description: Enjoy the beautiful island with parks and museums.

activities.title: Royal Swedish Opera
activities.description: Attend a performance at the grand opera house.

activities.title: Nobel Museum
activities.description: Learn about the Nobel Prize and its laureates.

activities.title: Stortorget
activities.description: Visit the historic square in the old town.

name: Athens
description: The capital city of Greece, known for its ancient landmarks and vibrant culture.

activities.title: Acropolis
activities.description: Visit the ancient citadel and the Parthenon.

activities.title: Acropolis Museum
activities.description: Explore the museum dedicated to the findings of the Acropolis.

activities.title: Ancient Agora
activities.description: Discover the ruins of the ancient marketplace.

activities.title: Plaka
activities.description: Wander through the charming old neighborhood.

activities.title: Temple of Olympian Zeus
activities.description: See the remains of the massive temple.

activities.title: National Archaeological Museum
activities.description: Explore one of the world's greatest museums of ancient Greek art.

activities.title: Mount Lycabettus
activities.description: Hike or take a funicular to the top for a panoramic view of Athens.

activities.title: Panathenaic Stadium
activities.description: Visit the historic stadium that hosted the first modern Olympic Games.

activities.title: Syntagma Square
activities.description: Watch the Changing of the Guard at the Greek Parliament.

activities.title: Monastiraki Flea Market
activities.description: Shop for souvenirs and antiques at the bustling market.

name: Venice
description: The capital of northern Italy's Veneto region, built on more than 100 small islands in a lagoon in the Adriatic Sea.

activities.title: St. Mark's Basilica
activities.description: Visit the cathedral church of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Venice.

activities.title: Doge's Palace
activities.description: Tour the former residence of the Doge of Venice.

activities.title: Grand Canal
activities.description: Take a boat ride along the main waterway of Venice.

activities.title: Rialto Bridge
activities.description: See the oldest of the four bridges spanning the Grand Canal.

activities.title: Murano
activities.description: Visit the series of islands known for their glassmaking.

activities.title: Burano
activities.description: Explore the colorful island famous for its lace work.

activities.title: Peggy Guggenheim Collection
activities.description: See the modern art collection in the Palazzo Venier dei Leoni.

activities.title: Teatro La Fenice
activities.description: Attend a performance at the famous opera house.

activities.title: Bridge of Sighs
activities.description: Visit the famous bridge connecting the Doge's Palace to the prisons.

activities.title: Gondola Ride
activities.description: Enjoy a romantic gondola ride through the canals of Venice.
